evidence.claim: Clinical Notes AI utilizes AWS for its infrastructure needs.
The platform adheres to FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Integration with HL7 is mentioned for interoperability with existing healthcare systems.
X12 transaction sets are supported for claims processing.
Utilizes EDI Compliant transactions to exchange health information securely.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of intent to exchange X12 data. Focus appears to be on AI and clinical data.
